actionCalls.description: Send email 5 days before subscription start date
actionCalls.name: Service_will_begin
actionCalls.label: Service will begin

decisions.description: If "Confirm new domain for SEO Migration" is true in the opportunity then create "Get client's new domain for SEO Migration" task
decisions.name: Confirm_new_domain_for_SEO_Migration
decisions.label: Confirm new domain for SEO Migration

decisions.description: Evaluate the MLS related with the Opportunity
decisions.name: MLS
decisions.label: MLS?

rules.name: SEO_Key_Word_Analysis_SEO_Migration_SEO_Opt_GBP_Posts
rules.label: SEO Key Word Analysis, SEO Migration, SEO Opt, GBP Posts

Flow.description: Create SS, Send emails, Create Tasks

formulas.name: DueDate14BDays
formulas.expression: CASE( MOD({!$Flow.CurrentDate}- DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, ({!$Flow.CurrentDate}) + 14 + FLOOR((14-1)/5)*2, 1, ({!$Flow.CurrentDate}) + 14+ FLOOR((14)/5)*2, 2, ({!$Flow.CurrentDate}) + 14 + FLOOR((14+1)/5)*2, 3, ({!$Flow.CurrentDate}) + 14 + FLOOR((14+2)/5)*2, 4, ({!$Flow.CurrentDate}) + 14 + FLOOR((14+3)/5)*2, 5, ({!$Flow.CurrentDate}) + 14 + CEILING((14)/5)*2, 6, ({!$Flow.CurrentDate}) - IF(14>0,1,0) + 14 + CEILING((14)/5)*2, null)

formulas.name: forDueDateQuarterly
formulas.expression: CASE( {!Count}, 0, IF(AND( OR( {!forMonth}=1, {!forMonth}=2, {!forMonth}=3), {!forThisYear}=0) , DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),03,31), DATE(YEAR(TODAY())+1,03,31)), 1, IF( AND(OR( {!forMonth}=1, {!forMonth}=2, {!forMonth}=3, {!forMonth}=4, {!forMonth}=5, {!forMonth}=6),{!forThisYear}=0) , DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),06,30), DATE(YEAR(TODAY())+1,06,30)), 2, IF( AND(OR( {!forMonth}=10, {!forMonth}=11, {!forMonth}=12),{!forThisYear}=1 ), DATE(YEAR(TODAY())+1,09,30), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),09,30)), 3, IF( AND(OR( {!forMonth}=10, {!forMonth}=11, {!forMonth}=12),{!forThisYear}=0) , DATE(YEAR(TODAY())+1,12,31), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),12,31)), DATE(2023,3,31) )

formulas.name: forPagesCopywrittingName
formulas.expression: CASE( {!Count}, 1, {!$Record.Account__r.Name} + "- Neighborhood Guide - #1", 2, {!$Record.Account__r.Name} + "- Neighborhood Guide - #2", 3, {!$Record.Account__r.Name} + "- Neighborhood Guide - #3", 4, {!$Record.Account__r.Name} + "- Neighborhood Guide - #4", 5, {!$Record.Account__r.Name} + "- Neighborhood Guide - #5", 6, {!$Record.Account__r.Name} +"- Neighborhood Guide - #6", {!$Record.Account__r.Name} +"- Agent Bio" )

formulas.name: forScheduleMeetingName
formulas.expression: IF( OR({!$Record.Opportunity__r.VIP__c}= true, {!$Record.Opportunity__r.Semi_Custom_Pod__c} = true), "Schedule Design intake call", "Schedule welcome call" )

formulas.name: forThisYear
formulas.expression: CASE( {!Count}, 0, IF(TODAY()> DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),02,15),1,0), 1, IF(TODAY()> DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),05,15),1,0), 2, IF(TODAY()> DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),08,15),1,0), 3, IF(TODAY()> DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),11,15),1,0), 0 )

formulas.name: LastDayAllRT
formulas.expression: IF( MONTH( {!DateValue} ) = 12, DATE( YEAR( {!DateValue} ), 12, 31 ), DATE( YEAR( {!DateValue} ), MONTH({!DateValue} ) + 1, 1) - 1)

formulas.name: LastDaySocialMedia
formulas.expression: IF( MONTH( {!DateValue_1} ) = 12, DATE( YEAR( {!DateValue_1} ), 12, 20 ), DATE( YEAR( {!DateValue_1} ), MONTH({!DateValue_1} ) , 20) )

Flow.label: LP - New Service

recordCreates.name: Confirm_new_domain_for_SEO_Migration_task
recordCreates.label: Confirm new domain for SEO Migration task

value.stringValue: Confirm new domain for SEO Migration
